/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and movement in the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the colorful buildings. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
